history.proof: intros x H. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z. sauto depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: assert (exists y, x * y = 1%Z) as [y Hy].
exceptions.exn: In environment x : Z H : inversible Z Z.mul 1%Z x y : ?A The term "x" has type "Z" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: intros x H. assert (exists y, x * y = 1%Z) as [y Hy]. apply inv_com with Z.mul; auto. apply Z.eq_mul_1 in Hy. destruct Hy as [H1 | H2]. -- left. auto. -- right. auto.
